title: President Donald J. Trump Is Supporting Women’s Political Empowerment Through Increased Participation in Global Security Processes – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			
Issued on:
June 11, 2019
By investing in women around the world, we’re investing in families, we’re investing in prosperity, and we’re investing in peace.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROMOTING PEACE AND SECURITY BY EMPOWERING WOMEN: President Donald J. Trump has released a strategy to enhance women’s leadership in efforts to prevent conflict, stem terrorism, and promote security.ADDRESSING INEQUALITY AND VIOLENCE: Across the world, there are strong correlations between women’s empowerment and stability.AN ADMINISTRATION PRIORITY: The Strategy will build on President Trump and his Administration’s existing efforts to empower women and girls across the globe.
